response.original_title: Jim Henson's Holiday Special with Fraggle Rock and Emmet Otter
response.overview: Remastered 26 min “The Bells of Fraggle Rock” holiday themed episode, along with a 52 min remastered version of Emmet Otter’s Christmas Special (1978).  Both titles are already out on DVD and have previously aired on HBO, Disney Channel and on CBC in Canada.
response.tagline: Remastered 26 min “The Bells of Fraggle Rock” holiday themed episode, along with a 52 min remastered version of Emmet Otter’s Christmas Special (1978).
response.title: Jim Henson's Holiday Special with Fraggle Rock and Emmet Otter
